description:
AlinmaPay is a digital wallet supervised by SAMA, available either for our partners’ individuals or business owners. Register now without the need of having bank account so you can pay to merchants using a digital card or through QR Code, paying for bills, receive and transfer locally and internationally easily and securely. Also the wallet can be used to split the bill amount with your family and friends.

AlinmaPay allows you to:
- Register immediately and without having a bank account. 
- Fund your wallet using multiple methods.
- Make purchases from merchants, restaurants, and online stores through a digital card or QR code.
- Transfer money to any local or international bank accounts quickly and with competitive fees.
- Transfer from and to AlinmaPay, request, send, or receive money to and from your family and friends, simply through your phones contacts list.
- Pay SADAD bills and MOI payments.
- Split the bill among your family and friends.
- Cash withdrawal from Alinma Bank ATMs.
- Instant Chatting with your family and friends, through your contact.

• Local customer support always ready to help.

Google Gemini app is your personal, proactive and powerful AI assistant.

With Gemini on your iPhone or iPad, you can:

– Go Live with Gemini to brainstorm ideas, simplify complex topics and rehearse for important moments. Share your camera or screen in Gemini Live conversations to talk with Gemini about anything that you see. Just click on the Gemini Live button in your Gemini app
– Bring your ideas to life with Canvas. From prompt to prototype, create apps, games, web pages, infographics, Audio Overviews and more
– Connect with your favourite Google apps, like Search, YouTube, Google Maps, Gmail and more
– Study smarter and explore any topic with quiz and flashcard creation, interactive visuals and real-world examples
– Turn any file into a podcast that you can listen to any time, anywhere
– Create and edit stunning images from just a few words
– Plan trips better and faster
– Get summaries, deep dives and source links, all in one place
– Brainstorm new ideas or improve existing ones

Try Nano Banana: State-of-the-art image generation and editing built on Gemini 2.5 Flash


Level up your Gemini app experience by upgrading to the Plus plan – unlock new and powerful features to boost your creativity and productivity:
– Get more access to our most powerful models, like 2.5 Pro
– Generate and dive into detailed reports on any topic with Deep Research powered by 2.5 Pro
– Turn words into high-quality, eight-second video clips with video generation with Veo 3.1 Fast and more.

Google AI Plus includes additional benefits. Gemini app, as part of Google AI Plus, will be available to qualifying Google Workspace business and education plans. Learn more: https://gemini.google/subscriptions/

Get even more out of your Gemini app experience by upgrading to the Pro plan, which helps you tackle complex tasks and projects. Enjoy an industry-leading 1M token context window (enabling Gemini to process up to 1,500 pages of text or 30k lines of code), and higher access to our most capable model 2.5 Pro, Deep Research on 2.5 Pro and video generation with Veo 3.1 Fast.

Gemini in Google AI Pro includes additional benefits as part of a Google AI Pro subscription. The Gemini app, as part of Google AI Pro, will continue to be available to qualifying Google Workspace business and education plans. Learn more: https://gemini.google/subscriptions/

Get the best of Gemini app by upgrading to the Ultra plan – unlock the highest level of access to the best of Google AI and exclusive features. Get the highest access to Google's most powerful model, like 2.5 Pro, features like video generation with Veo 3.1, Deep Research on 2.5 Pro and unlock Gemini 2.5 Deep Think. You'll also get early access to try our newest AI innovations as they become available, including Agent Mode.

Gemini in Google AI Ultra includes additional benefits as part of a Google AI Ultra subscription. Google AI Ultra for Business is available as an add-on to Google Workspace customers. Learn more: https://support.google.com/a/answer/16345165

The Google Gemini mobile app is available in selected languages and countries. Learn more:
g.co/gemini/iosrequirements

Gemini Live feature availability varies based on language. Learn more:
g.co/gemini/ioslanguages

While Gemini can help you with many tasks like checking the weather, giving directions, and finding and summarising information across the web and apps, Gemini does not yet support device actions like setting an alarm, sending a text message and others on iOS.

Review the Gemini Apps Privacy Notice:
g.co/gemini/privacynotice

webook.com is Saudi Arabia’s ultimate super-app for entertainment, travel, and lifestyle. It is the one-stop platform to discover and book concerts, sporting events, cultural shows, flights, hotels, restaurants, memorabilia, auctions, and more. Whether you are in Riyadh, Jeddah, the Eastern Province, or anywhere else in the Kingdom, webook.com connects you to everything exciting. With updated listings, verified bookings, and a simple interface, having fun and planning trips has never been easier.

Events & Tickets: Book tickets for concerts, festivals, sports matches, comedy shows, exhibitions, and cultural events across Saudi Arabia. From headline concerts at Riyadh Season and football games in the Roshn Saudi League to family attractions in Jeddah or workshops in Dammam, if you can book it, it is here. Follow artists, athletes, and venues to get notifications on new events. All tickets are official with no markups, and you can resell securely if plans change. Skip scalpers and queues – your tickets live safely on your phone, ready to scan at the gate.

Flights & Hotels: Plan your travel with ease. Book flights with top airlines, compare schedules, and reserve hotels or resorts at great rates through our partner almosafer. Whether flying Riyadh–Dubai, a business trip to Jeddah, or a weekend staycation in Abha, webook.com makes it simple. Filter by price, rating, or location. Choose luxury resorts, city hotels, or budget stays – all with secure payments and instant confirmation. With integrated flights and hotels search, planning your trip has never been smoother.

Restaurants & Dining: Turn outings into complete experiences by reserving tables at top restaurants. Discover Saudi Arabia’s best dining, from fine dining in Riyadh to cafés in Jeddah and trendy spots in Khobar. With integration from Servme, when you book a concert or football match you will get recommendations for nearby restaurants. Pair your event with the right meal – a romantic dinner, family lunch, or casual hangout. Book events and restaurants together in one app.

Shop & Auctions: For fans of sports, music, and culture, webook.com offers a memorabilia shop and exclusive auctions in one place. Browse and buy signed jerseys, autographed posters, and official souvenirs from your favorite teams and artists. Join live or timed auctions to bid on rare items, luxury goods, and collectibles you will not find elsewhere. During select events, take part in real-time auctions for unique pieces such as signed guitars or rare football boots. All memorabilia is verified authentic, and every auction is secure and transparent, giving you confidence as a buyer or collector.

Why webook.com?

All-in-One Platform: Tickets, flights, hotels, restaurants, memorabilia, and auctions in one app.

Trusted by Millions: Millions of users in Saudi Arabia already use webook.com.

Official Partnerships: Authorized ticketing partner for major events, including Roshn Saudi League matches.

Personalized Discovery: Recommendations based on your interests and bookings.

Secure Payments: Options like Mada, Apple Pay, credit cards, with instant confirmation.

24/7 Support: Multilingual service in Arabic and English.

From massive concerts in Riyadh to luxury dining in Jeddah, from football in Dammam to rare collectibles through auctions, webook.com is the super-app that brings it all together.

Download webook.com – fun things to do today and unlock a world of entertainment, travel, dining, shopping, and more. Discover new experiences, book what you love, and make memories with a few taps. From concerts in Riyadh to flights for your next holiday, restaurants in Jeddah to memorabilia and auctions, webook.com has it all. Having fun has never been this simple – everything you need is in one app.

Your next adventure starts here. With webook.com, you will never miss the experiences that matter most.

We’re anywhere you are

Experience Ninja for yourself. Download the Ninja App now and get a FREE delivery on your first order!

Awaed platform is the first Saudi licensed platform that allows access to all investment products such as investment funds and stock markets through one place and one portfolio, for all types of users, from investors to non-investors, by empowering them through an easy and flexible user experience.

What makes 'Joy Awards' truly special, as it does every year, is that the winners are chosen by the fans who love and cherish them. With the 'Joy Awards' App, it's you who will nominate and vote for your beloved stars and releases in Music, Cinema, Series, Directors, Sports, and Influencers, all for free!



You will nominate and cast your votes in two phases:




First Phase: Nominating Your Favorite Stars and Releases
In the nomination phase, which lasts for one month, you play a crucial role in shaping the competition. 
Here's where YOU come in – choose your favorite nominee from the names or titles listed in each category. If your top pick isn't there, don't worry! You have the chance to add your own favorite name or title, as long as it meets the terms and conditions: it should be a release or achievement from 2025. 
During the nomination phase, you can nominate only once for each category.
This phase eventually leads to the selection of the top four final nominees in each category, representing the stars and releases with the most nominations.
 
Second Phase: Voting for Your Favorite Stars and Releases
After the nominations have been counted, the voting phase begins with the top four nominees in each category, which also spans one month.
Here's where YOU make the difference – cast your votes for your favorite nominees. 
And a month later, the voting counts are gathered, leading to the grand reveal of the winners during the live "Joy Awards 2026" ceremony in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
During the voting phase, you can vote only once for each category.

description:
GoodShort: a must-have app for original dramas and movies

To enjoy original short dramas and movies of a minute or so, anytime, anywhere, whether in travel, at home, or at a restaurant

We have a myriad of short dramas and movies adapted from novels with high quality, high definition, and high update frequency, guaranteeing a different screen experience for you.

[Diverse, all-inclusive content]
There are a lot of short dramas and reels adapted from novels, definitely something fascinating to you. From modern romance, urban romance, and youth romance to live-in sons-in-law, magic doctors, CEOs, billionaires, queens, and gods of war, all your favorite genres and themes can be found here!

[A personalized list of works you may like]
The excellent recommendation system will help you find the best originals, short dramas, and short movies adapted from the hottest novels, meeting the preferences of all kinds of drama and movie lovers!

[A user-friendly, elegant interface]
The simple, clear, user-friendly interface is an ergonomic fit for your eyes.

[Smooth experience]
Smooth streaming, as well as the comfortable interface design, will give you unparalleled viewing enjoyment. The high-quality content output provides a rich, high-definition, smooth, and flawless screen experience.

[Unlimited resources, super fast updates]
The selected, diversified content will satisfy your viewing needs for different content. Subscribe to your favorite works to keep up with the latest updates of your favorite dramas.

Whether you want to relax or pass the time while waiting, GoodShort is the best choice for you. Download it and start exploring!

About the Automatic Subscription Renewal:

1. Payment: After you confirm the purchase, the fee will be automatically charged to your Apple iTunes account.

2. Renewal: 24 hours before your subscription expires, the renewal fee will be automatically deducted from your Apple iTunes account. After the renewal payment is processed, your premium membership will be extended automatically.

3. If you want to unsubscribe, please open the iPhone "Settings"-->enter "iTunes Store and App Store"-->click "Apple ID", select "View Apple ID", go to the "Account Settings" page, click "Subscribe" choose GoodShort to unsubscribe. if you do not unsubscription at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period, this subscription will be automatically renewed.

We are looking forward to hearing your comments and ideas. Please email us at contact@goodshort.com

description:
Save Meals. Enjoy Deals. Share the Barakah

Barakah connects you with surplus meals from top restaurants, cafés, and bakeries — fresh, delicious, and up to 70% off every day!

Why You’ll Love Barakah
- Discover great meals for less.
- Follow your favorite spots and get instant updates on surplus meals nearby.
- Explore Member Experiences—see what others got, share your finds, and discover hidden gems from the Barakah community.
- Send a Gift Voucher—share blessings with friends and family, and let them enjoy a meal full of Barakah. 
- Pay easily with Apple Pay, Mada, or credit card.

How It Works
Restaurants and cafés sometimes end their day with perfectly fresh meals that just didn’t sell.
Barakah gives these meals a second chance—offering them to you at up to 70% off.
You save money, reduce waste, and enjoy good food that deserves to be shared.


Available in all major cities in KSA. 
Want to see us in your city? Follow us on social media and send us a direct message of where you would like us to come next!

Don't miss out on our 100% fresh deals! Download the app now and enjoy blessings in every bite.


Follow us for sustainability tips, new restaurants, exclusive offers, and community stories!

Instagram - @barakahapp
Twitter - @barakahapp
TikTok - @barakahapp

CapCut offers easy-to-use video editing functions, in-APP fonts and effects, advanced features such as keyframe animation, smooth slow-motion, chroma key, and stabilization, to help you capture and snip moments.

Create fancy videos with other unique features: auto captions, text-to-speech, motion tracking, and background removal. Show your personality and go viral on TikTok, YouTube, Instagram, WhatsApp, and Facebook!

FEATURES
Basic video editing
• Trim and shorten clips and split or merge videos.
• Adjust video speed from 0.1x to 100x, and apply speed curves to clips.
• Animate video clips with incredible zoom in/out effects.
• Highlight the best moments with the freeze feature.
• Explore transition options with awesome effects on and between clips.

Advanced video editor
• Keyframe video animation is available for all settings.
• Edit videos to create smooth slow-motion with the optical flow feature and speed curve tool.
• Use the chroma key to remove specific colors from videos.
• Easy to arrange and preview clips on multi-track timeline.
• The stabilizing feature keeps video footage steady.

Intelligent features
• Auto captions: automate speech recognition and subtitles in videos.
• Text-to-speech: apply text-to-speech in multiple languages and voices.
• Background removal: automatically remove backgrounds.

Text & Stickers
• Add text to videos with different fonts and styles, choose unique text templates. Fonts can be imported locally.
• Subtitles can be added to the timeline of video tracks and can be moved and adjusted in one step.

Trending Effects & Filters
• Match video content with diverse filters that are updated weekly with the latest trends.
• Edit videos with hundreds of trending effects, including Glitch, Blur, 3D, etc.
• Add movie-style video filters or adjust video brightness, contrast, etc.

Music & Sound Effects
• Add millions of music clips and sound effects to videos.
• Extract audio, clips, and recordings from videos.

Easy to Share
• Custom video export resolution, HD video editor supports 4K 60fps exports and smart HDR.
• Adjust the format and share with your friends on social media platforms.
